column3: @whitehouse #whgc Grand Challenge - Do what is best for humanity; not religion, not political party, nor what will get "me" re-elected.
@whitehouse Grand Challenge - Do what is best for humanity; not religion, not political party, nor what will get "me" re-elected.
@whitehouse National broadband high speed Internet. Higher speeds for less cost across America.
@whitehouse Best bandwidth on the planet should be the USA's next Grand Challenge!  It will help Business and Education!
@whitehouse change food production so that nutritious and delicious food is cheaper than the processed junk available today

@whitehouse -

End the wars on drugs, in Iraq and Afghanistan. Bring the troops home and reduce defense spending by 50%
